genres.name: High Fantasy
genres.description: Features epic tales, often in imaginary worlds with magic and heroes.

genres.name: Low Fantasy
genres.description: Grounded in real-world settings with subtle magical elements.

genres.name: Sword and Sorcery
genres.description: Focuses on action-packed adventures with magic and combat.

genres.name: Dark Fantasy
genres.description: Blends fantasy with elements of horror or grimdark themes.

genres.name: Urban Fantasy
genres.description: Set in a modern urban setting with magical or supernatural elements.

genres.name: Historical Fantasy
genres.description: Incorporates fantasy elements into real historical settings.

genres.name: Romantic Fantasy
genres.description: Centers around romantic relationships in a fantasy setting.

genres.name: Steampunk
genres.description: Combines fantasy with industrial steam-powered technology.

genres.name: Dieselpunk
genres.description: Similar to steampunk but set in an era of diesel-powered technology.

genres.name: Mythopoeia
genres.description: Involves creating detailed mythologies and fictional universes.

genres.name: Fairy Tale
genres.description: Based on traditional fairy tales, often with a modern twist.

genres.name: Science Fantasy
genres.description: Merges elements of science fiction and fantasy.

genres.name: Comic Fantasy
genres.description: Features humorous and whimsical fantasy stories.

genres.name: Superhero Fantasy
genres.description: Involves characters with superpowers in a fantasy context.

genres.name: Grimdark Fantasy
genres.description: Characterized by a bleak, dark, and often violent setting.

genres.name: Magical Realism
genres.description: Blends realistic narrative with surreal, magical elements.

genres.name: Wuxia
genres.description: A Chinese genre featuring martial arts adventures in ancient settings.
